BRIEF-Barnes Group Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.72 April 27 (Reuters) - Barnes Group Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.68 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * CONTINUES TO ANTICIPATE 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF BETWEEN $60 TO $65 MILLION * 2018 EARNINGS ARE EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $3.03 TO $3.15 PER DILUTED SHARE * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.04, REVENUE VIEW $1.51 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
